name: Alien creature from space!
description:
Here's my work! Done in 48 our, while recovering from back injury! =D It was hard to sit and code for long, so some times it was done from bed! (God bless remote control!) XD

Also it should've been published in COMPO, but i have an issue with compiling stuff. And tired enought at 3 am just give up to resolve this issue. So JAM it is!

## SYNOPSIS:
You will be playing as Keep fallen space alien creature alive, make it
bigger!

## WHAT TO DO:
Keep building stuff!
Progress bar at top of screen showing how big
is your creature! When it will be big enough you will win!

## HOW TO PLAY
After you start HEART will spawn, try drag it to make a TUMOR.
Then, same drag move on TUMOR will duplicate it.
Right click on TUMOR will open Upgrade menu.
TUMOR can be upgraded to "TOWER"

## BALANCE FIX
(Dowload "LD46_Runuchok_Keep_it_Alive_BalanceFix")
Fixed all the issues with game's difficulty, now it's more fair, but still challenging! Plus fixed some minor bugs and added QUIT function)) (Press "Esc") XD Everything else is same with COMPO version of the game!
